text: Two conductors are of same shape and size. One of copper and the other of aluminium (less conducting) are placed in an uniform electric field. The charge induced in aluminium:-

options.a: Will be less than that in copper
options.b: Will be more than that in copper
options.c: Will be equal to that in copper
options.d: cannot be compared with that of copper

hint: Same charge induced in both spheres. (εr→same)
